message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: The Germany branch of the international publisher Wolters Kluwer [1] is looking for support in the Content Architecture Team in Munich.
The new position will mainly work on the FP7-ICT LOD2 project [1], but also on other internal and international content projects.
A background in information and/or computer science, familiarity with Web 2.0 and Semantic Data Web technologies as well as proper German and English language skills are mandatory.
For further information please have a look at the job offer profile (in German) available from:
http://lod2.eu/BlogPost/?p=73
speaker: SYSTEM
